title: Selling 942 INR in Uber Cash due to being scammed in India and not being able to use it in my home country
selftext:
Hi all,
I had an unfortunate situation on my last day of visiting Delhi last month. My Uber driver scammed me of around 1000 INR by telling me I needed to pay non-existing toll taxes. I contacted Uber that refunded me the money in Uber Cash. Unfortanetly, I can not use it here in my home country (Sweden) due to Ubers policy.

I am therefore selling this uber cash of 942 INR to the highest bidder. Please message me for further proof.

Thanks.


https://imgur.com/a/c5U1e1K
comments: Highest bidder what? Why would someone bid for it
you can use uber cash to pay for uber trips
